name: RHINO RACING LEGENDS - ( Top Free Addictive Arcade / Action 3D Animal Racing Fun Game )
name_original: RHINO RACING LEGENDS - ( Top Free Addictive Arcade / Action 3D Animal Racing Fun Game )
description:
RHINO RACING LEGENDS - ( Top Free Addictive Arcade / Action 3D Animal Racing Fun Game )

You are about to take on the most thrilling Rhino Ride of your life on this brutal Enclosure where vigilance is order of the day and carelessness is death itself.
Ride beyond your imagination and Hit other enemies.
Race against opponents and Defeat them,Boost up your speed like no one else can! .
Get ready to Ride On a RHINO and enjoy D life!

It's gonna be a tough ride!

* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
* Dozens of enemies ..Not So easy to Win
